amendment.description: At the end of bill (before the short title), insert the following: The amount otherwise provided in this Act for "The Historic Preservation Fund" is hereby decreased by $1,000,000 and increased by $1,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to re-direct $1 million for the Historic Preservation Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A052) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.
